display.title: Forgotten Depths
description: &&2Ancient Cities&&r are full of &&chostile vibration-sensing organisms&&r, and &&drare loot&&r.
&&3Sculk Sensors&&r are able to detect vibrations, including walking and &&dinteracting with blocks and items&&r.
&&cWardens&&r are large, &&3near-unkillable&&r monsters that can &&dblind players and deal high damage&&r.
However, their vision is &&dbased on vibrations&&r - &&eSnowballs&&r can be used to distract them.
&&7[Tinkerer's Quilt]&&r &&cWardens&&r do not spawn. This can be changed via &&6/gamerule doWardenSpawning true&&r.
&&7[Apathy]&&r On &&3easy difficulty&&r, &&cWardens&&r won't target the player, and won't apply blindness when provoked.
